trans-unit.source: Represents the geometry of a circle or ellipse.
trans-unit.target: Representa a geometria de um círculo ou elipse.

trans-unit.source: Use the EllipseGeometry class with a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path> element or a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> to draw an ellipse, or with the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to define an elliptical clip region.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe EllipseGeometry com um <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path>elemento ou um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>para desenhar uma elipse, ou com o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>para definir uma região de clip elíptico.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path>

trans-unit.source: The EllipseGeometry class also has many other uses.
trans-unit.target: A classe de EllipseGeometry também tem muitos outros usos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about EllipseGeometry, see [Geometry Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre EllipseGeometry, consulte [visão geral de geometria](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: EllipseGeometry Compared to Ellipse The <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> class has a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A>, and other rendering properties that EllipseGeometry lacks.
trans-unit.target: EllipseGeometry comparado a elipse a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>classe tiver um <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A>e outras propriedades de renderização que não tem EllipseGeometry.</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> class is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and therefore participates in the layout system; it can be used as the content of any element that supports <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> children.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>classe é um <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e, portanto, participa do sistema de layout; ele pode ser usado como o conteúdo de qualquer elemento que dá suporte a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>filhos.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>

trans-unit.source: The EllipseGeometry class, on the other hand, simply defines the geometry of an ellipse, and cannot render itself.
trans-unit.target: A classe EllipseGeometry, por outro lado, simplesmente define a geometria de uma elipse e não é possível processar a mesmo.

trans-unit.source: Because of its simplicity, it has a wider range of uses.
trans-unit.target: Devido à sua simplicidade, ele tem uma grande variedade de usos.

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features An EllipseGeometry is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Freezable EllipseGeometry um de recursos é um tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>de objeto e, portanto, pode ser congelada para melhorar o desempenho.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>recursos, como congelamento e clonagem, consulte [visão geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> class that has a horizontal diameter equal to the width of the passed <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>, a vertical diameter equal to the length of the passed <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>, and a center point location equal to the center of the passed <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref> classe que tem um diâmetro horizontal igual à largura do passado <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>, diâmetro vertical igual ao comprimento da transmitido <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>e um centro de local igual para o Centro de transmitido do ponto de <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that describes the ellipse dimensions.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que descreve as dimensões de elipse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> class as an ellipse that has a specified center location, x radius, and y radius.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref> classe como uma elipse que tem um local central especificado, radius e y radius.

trans-unit.source: The location of the center of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: O local do centro da elipse.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal radius of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: O raio horizontal da elipse.

trans-unit.source: The vertical radius of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: O raio vertical da elipse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> class that has the specified position, size, and transformation.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref> classe que tem a posição especificada, o tamanho e a transformação.

trans-unit.source: The location of the center of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: O local do centro da elipse.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal radius of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: O raio horizontal da elipse.

trans-unit.source: The vertical radius of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: O raio vertical da elipse.

trans-unit.source: The transformation to apply to the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: A transformação para aplicar a elipse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que representa a caixa delimitadora deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method does not consider the extra area potentially added by a stroke.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não considera a área extra potencialmente adicionada por um traço.

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A caixa delimitadora do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the center point of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ponto central do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The center point of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O ponto central do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.Center*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.Center*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.Center*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso (mas eles não podem resolver) mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> era de propriedade<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a área disso <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> methods (such as GetArea) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: Alguns <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>métodos (como GetArea) produzir ou use uma aproximação poligonal de geometria.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation.
trans-unit.target: O fator de tolerância Especifica a distância máxima entre pontos nessa aproximação poligonal.

trans-unit.source: Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but they require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.
trans-unit.target: Valores menores de tolerância a produzem a melhor aproximações, mas elas exigem processamento mais que uma aproximação com um fator de tolerância grande.

trans-unit.source: The maximum bounds on the distance between points in the polygonal approximation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: Os limites máximo na distância entre pontos na aproximação poligonal de geometria.

trans-unit.source: Smaller values produce more accurate results but cause slower execution.
trans-unit.target: Valores menores produzirem resultados mais precisos, mas fazem a execução mais lenta.

trans-unit.source: If `tolerance` is less than .000001, .000001 is used instead.
trans-unit.target: Se `tolerance` é menor que.000001,.000001 é usado em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType"></xref>, that specifies whether the tolerance factor is an absolute value or relative to the area of this geometry.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType"> </xref>, que especifica se o fator de tolerância é um valor absoluto ou relativas à área desse geometria.

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this ellipse.
trans-unit.target: A área da região dessa elipse preenchida.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref> objeto está vazio.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref> estiver vazia; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> object can have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref> objeto pode ter em segmentos de curva.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> object can have curved segments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref> objeto pode ter em segmentos de curva; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-radius value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de x-radius do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The x-radius value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de x-radius do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusX*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusX*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-radius value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de y radius do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The y-radius value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de y radius do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusY*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusY*>
